channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Confused about good
item.description: How often do we assume that popular things are good, and that good things become popular? If your work doesn’t catch on, does that mean it wasn’t good...

item.title: 2 Changes To Massive UFC 308 Card Have Made The Event Even Better
item.description: The UFC 308 main card is still intact, but two noteworthy changes to the event’s prelim lineup have created more intriguing matchups.

item.title: Surprising Leader Among U.S. Industries For Green Investments
item.description: In Q2 of 2024, the retail sector in the U.S. invested almost $33.6 billion in green technology or clean energy—ahead of the energy and industry sector...

item.title: Netflix Needs Customer Service Help Like All Of Our Content Providers
item.description: Customer experience (CX) and total customer experience (TX) are on everyone’s radar screen, but seldom make it to the top of investment priorities.

item.title: GPUs, CPUs And Serial Chips – Who’s Going To Be Manufacturing, And Who Will Be Begging For Help?
item.description: Some techies have some fairly detailed opinions about what’s going to happen next in a fast-changing hardware market.

item.title: Decisions as effort
item.description: Why are we more likely to get tasks done than to take on new initiatives? Checking something off a to-do list requires far less emotional energy than ...

item.title: Moving toward ease
item.description: “Ease” isn’t the same as “easy.” In fact, they’re often at odds. Easy work is hardly worth our effort. It can deaden us instead of giving us the chanc...

item.title: The challenge of focus groups for bold ideas
item.description: “We’re thinking of having a holiday every year where kids of all ages go door to door unescorted and beg for candy, and adults dress up in expensive a...

item.title: AWS And The NFL Join Forces To Empower Future Cybersecurity Leaders
item.description: This collaboration merges AWS’s leadership in cloud technology and the NFL’s commitment to community outreach, particularly for minority students.

item.title: Foundering or floundering?
item.description: Floundering is flopping around and making little progress. A Dutch word for getting mired and lost. Foundering is what we call it when the ship goes d...
